info.title: UMSAPI
info.description: User Management System is a microservice that handles the user authentication for any integration with any application that requires user authentication/ management functionality.

value.ResponseMessage: Password must be a minimum of eight(8) characters
Pin must have a between 4 and 6 numeric characters
This link has already been used

200.description: OK - Email is sent to the email address of the user who made the request.

value.ResponseMessage: Invalid Reset Password Url, Enter a valid Url

post.description: Sign Up user with OTP i.e Validating user phone number and signing up the user.

Data.Message: An Otp has been sent to your Mobile / Email

value.ResponseMessage: RefreshToken does not exist / is not usable for this user

parameters.name: thirdPartyName
parameters.description: Third party name e.g google, facebook, twitter etc.

parameters.name: redirectUrl
parameters.description: Redirect Url of the application after authentication

get.description: This endpoint allows third party sign up or sign in.

200.description: OK- The token and refresh token is sent to the redirectUrl as a query parameter

value.ResponseMessage: third party name / redirect url must not be empty
